message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Name' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: The Name must contain at least %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_NAME_LONG
message.locale: Name must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The service group, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_DESCRIPTION_LONG
message.locale: Description must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comments must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_CANNOT_ADD_CANCELLED_SERVICEOFFERING
message.locale: A canceled service offering cannot be added to this service group.
A cancelled service offering cannot be added to this service group.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_CANNOT_CHANGE_SERVICEOFFERINGS_FOR_CANCELED_GROUP
message.locale: The service offerings for a canceled service group cannot be changed.
The service offerings for a cancelled service group cannot be changed.

message.name: TEXT_SERVICE_GROUPS
message.locale: Service Groups

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_CODE_LONG
message.locale: Code must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_CODE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The code, %1s, already exists for the service group, %2s.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_SERVICEGROUP_IS_CANCELED_CANNOT_ADD_ANOTHER_SERVICEGROUP
message.locale: The Service Group, %1s is '%2c', service group, %3s cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_IS_ASSOCIATED_TO_ANOTHER_SERVICEGROUP_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The Service Group, %1s is associated with service group(s), %2s,it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_IS_ASSOCIATED_TO_ANOTHER_SERVICEGROUP_CANNOT_ADD
message.locale: The Service Group, %1s is associated with service group, %2s,it cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_IS_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED_CANNOT_ADD
message.locale: The Service Group, %1s is already associated with service group, %2s,it cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_IS_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED_SERVICE_GROUP_CANNOT_ADD
message.locale: The Service, %1s is already associated with service group, %2s,it cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_CANNOT_SAME_SERVICE_GROUP_TO_SELF
message.locale: The same service group cannot be added to itself.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_IS_PARENT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_AS_CHILD
message.locale: The service group, %1s, is a parent of this service group,cannot be added as child.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_REFERENCE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The reference, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_REFERENCE_MUST_NOT_CONTAIN_BLANK_SPACES
message.locale: If entered, Reference must not contain blank spaces.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_REFERENCE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: Service Group with the given reference, %1s, does not exist.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_UPPERNAME_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: Service Group name exceeds the max length. Maximum limit is %1n characters

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_MAPPING_FILE_INCORRECT
message.locale: The mapping file specified is invalid one or contains the errors.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_XRV_PARSING_XML_ERROR
message.locale: The errors encountered while parsing the XML string.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEGROUP_FV_REFERENCE_LONG
message.locale: Reference must be less than or equal to %1n characters.
